docs.snippet: When Andrei Kirilenko opted out of a $10.2 million contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves, the 32-year-old forward did so presumably looking for one last long-term deal of his career....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Andrei Kirilenko opted out of a $10.2 million contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves, the 32-year-old forward did so presumably looking for one last long-term deal of his career.

headline.main: Kirilenko: 'Time to Take a Shot to Win a Title'
headline.print_headline: Kirilenko: 'Time to Take a Shot to Win a Title'
